abilities.name: Stone Camouflage.
abilities.description: The gnome has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

abilities.name: Gnome Cunning.
abilities.description: The gnome has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The gnome's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 11). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: nondetection (self only)
1/day each: blindness/deafness, blur, disguise self
